properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Comforter has come The Comforter has come The Holy Ghost from heav'n The Father's promise giv'n Oh spread the tidings 'round Wherever man is found The Comforter has come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh spread the tidings 'round Wherever man is found Wherever human hearts And human woes abound Let every Christian tongue Proclaim the joyful sound The Comforter has come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The long long night is past The morning breaks at last And hushed the dreadful wail And fury of the blast As o'er the golden hills The day advances fast The Comforter has come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lo the great King of kings With healing in His wings To every captive soul A full deliv'rance brings And through the vacant cells The song of triumph rings The Comforter has come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh boundless love divine How shall this tongue of mine To wond'ring mortals tell The matchless grace divine That I a child of hell Should in His image shine The Comforter has come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Of lords He is the Lord Divine the living Word His name the sweetest heard His will redemption brings O spread the tidings 'round Wherever man is found The Lord is King of kings{/lang-eng}
